description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Hong Kong- Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Zhuhai Port (Hong Kong bound)
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 港珠澳大橋珠海口岸(往香港方向)

2026-02-22T16:50:00.CONTENT_EN: The vehicle clearance plaza (Hong Kong bound) of the HZMB Zhuhai Port is very busy now. Members of the public who plan to drive their private cars back to Hong Kong via HZMB are advised to plan ahead their journeys, reserve sufficient commuting time, and be patient while queuing. The public can check the real time situations of the vehicle clearance plaza of HZMB Zhuhai Port through the WeChat official accounts (or visit https://traffic-info.gzazhka.com:5015/#/)before starting their journeys.
2026-02-22T16:50:00.CONTENT_CN: 港珠澳大橋珠海口岸(往香港方向)的車輛通關廣場現時非常繁忙，計劃駕駛私家車經大橋返港的市民請妥善規劃行程，預留充裕交通時間，同時在輪候時保持忍讓。市民可於開始行程前透過「港珠澳大橋珠海口岸」或「珠海發布」微信公眾號內的「大橋口岸實時通關」服務(或前往https://traffic-info.gzazhka.com:5015/#/)，查詢大橋珠海口岸的車輛實時通關情況。

2026-02-23T10:15:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to high wind , the following special traffic and transport arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR), with details as shown below: The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR is lowered from 100 km/h to 50 km/h.
2026-02-23T10:15:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於強風，港珠澳大橋香港連接路已實施以下特別交通及運輸安排： 港珠澳大橋香港連接路的最高車速限制由每小時100 公里降低至每小時50 公里。

2026-02-23T15:15:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to improved weather condition, the following arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR): The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR resumes to 100 km/h.
2026-02-23T15:15:00.CONTENT_CN: 因天氣情況改善，港珠澳大橋香港連接路已實施以下安排： 港珠澳大橋香港連接路最高車速限制恢復為每小時100 公里。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: High Speed Rail (Hong Kong Section) scheduling arrangements and additional temporary train trips
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 高速鐵路(香港段)車務調度及加開臨時列車車次

2026-02-24T11:37:00.CONTENT_EN: In response to the demand, the High Speed Rail (Hong Kong Section) train service will be adjusted as follows: • Temporary sleeper train trips will be added on 24, 25 Feb & 4, 5 Mar: o To Beijingxi: G898 o From Beijingxi: G897 • Schedules of some train trips will be adjusted from 2 Feb to 14 Mar Purchase your tickets up to 15 days ahead of travel: • 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app • Appointed travel agents • Hong Kong West Kowloon Station o Self-service Ticket Machines: bring valid and original travel documents of all passengers; only e-payment methods are accepted (for example, contactless credit cards, WeChat Pay or Alipay) o Ticketing Counters: may require a longer waiting time Train schedules: • 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app • High Speed Rail website or mobile app
2026-02-24T11:37:00.CONTENT_CN: 配合客運需求，高速鐵路(香港段)列車服務將作出以下調整： •2 月24、25 日及3 月4、5 日將加開以下臨時臥鋪列車車次： o 前往北京西：G898 o 由北京西出發：G897 •2 月2日至3 月14日部份列車班次時間調整。 如需購買15天內的車票： •12306官方網站（12306.cn）或手機應用程式 •指定代理 •前往香港西九龍站 o 使用自助售票機：需帶備所有乘車人士的有效旅遊證件正本；只接受電子支付（如感應式信用卡、微信支付或支付寶） o 使用票務櫃位：可能需要輪候較長時間 列車服務詳情： •12306官方網站（12306.cn）或手機應用程式 •高速鐵路網頁及手機應用程式
